effect.diamond_pearl: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user’s Attack and Defense by one stage each.
effect.platinum: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user’s Attack and Defense by one stage each.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user’s Attack and Defense by one stage each.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: Lowers the user’s Attack and Defense by one stage after inflicting damage.
short_effect.platinum: Lowers the user’s Attack and Defense by one stage after inflicting damage.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Lowers the user’s Attack and Defense by one stage after inflicting damage.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user attacks the foe with great power. However, it also lowers the user’s Attack and Defense.
flavor_text.platinum: The user attacks the foe with great power. However, it also lowers the user’s Attack and Defense.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user attacks the foe with great power. However, it also lowers the user’s Attack and Defense.
